Intensive Trainings - IITs

New Zealand

11-April to 20-April-2023

with trainers Anna Groves, Fabiola Fuentes, Jeff Brown, and Sabine Geiger. Organized by Irma Jager (details).

Montenegro

10-May to 19-May-2023

with trainers Kathleen Macferran, Ian Peatey, Liv Larsson, and Dmitriy Kopina. Organized by Srdjan Vukčević (details).

Norway

26-Jun to 05-Jul-2023

with trainers Anniken Poulsson Beer, Liv Larsson, Amal Mekouar, and Giacomo Poleschi. Organized by Gert Skoczowsky-Danielsen (details).

United States

11-Aug to 20-Aug-2023

with trainers Stephanie Bachmann-Mattei, Morris Ervin, Camila Reyes, and Rodger Sorrow. Organized by Eric Huang and Lori DeLaney (details).

Germany

24-Sep to 03-Oct-2023

with trainers Roxy Manning, François Beausoleil, Iris Bawidamann, and John Kinyon. Organized by Jürgen Engel (details).
